mapper.sql: ID, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, REQUEST_ID, MODEL_ID, RULE_TYPE, RULE_RESULT
mapper.insert: insert into rule_result (CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, REQUEST_ID, MODEL_ID, RULE_TYPE, RULE_RESULT) values (sysdate(), sysdate(), #{requestId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modelId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ruleType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ruleResult,jdbcType=OTHER})

mapper.update:
update rule_result
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
REQUEST_ID = #{requestId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MODEL_ID = #{modelId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RULE_TYPE = #{ruleType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RULE_RESULT = #{ruleResult,jdbcType=OTHER},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update rule_result set CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, REQUEST_ID = #{requestId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MODEL_ID = #{modelId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RULE_TYPE = #{ruleType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RULE_RESULT = #{ruleResult,jdbcType=OTHER} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
